Ethiopia fantastic, Darjeeling seriously heating up

Jul 26, 2008

I’m in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.  There is lots of exciting work for me to do here.  More on that soon.

I just missed things really heating up in Darjeeling.  Yesterday, the homes of two top people of the political party formerly in power (GNLF) and a major restaurant in town were destroyed.  See more in The Telegraph… See my summary post for background info on the political situation there.
